# Modern Portfolio Website

This is a professional, modern portfolio website built with React and TailwindCSS. The website features:

- ✅ Modern, responsive design
- ✅ Dark/light mode toggle 
- ✅ Smooth animations with Framer Motion
- ✅ Professional sections (Hero, About, Skills, Projects, Experience, Contact)
- ✅ Interactive components and hover effects
- ✅ Optimized performance and SEO
- ✅ Clean, maintainable code structure

## Development Guidelines

- Follow React best practices and functional components
- Use TailwindCSS for styling with custom theme
- Implement smooth animations with Framer Motion
- Ensure responsive design across all devices
- Maintain clean component structure and reusability
- Add proper accessibility features
- Optimize for performance and SEO

## Project Structure

- `/src/components` - Reusable UI components
- `/src/sections` - Main page sections
- `/src/hooks` - Custom React hooks
- `/src/utils` - Utility functions

## Customization

Update personal information in each section component to match your profile, experience, and portfolio.
